articles.content: How long will it be before it ever gets back to what it was, or will it ever get back to what it was, Im not too sure, but what I am very, very confident of is whatever sacrifices we make in the next… [+3123 chars]

articles.author: Jourdan Canil
articles.title: Curtain raisers for players who miss out on selection? - Australian Football League
articles.description: Western Bulldogs coach Luke Beveridge believes curtain raisers could solve a big problem for players this year
articles.content:
CURTAIN raisers might be the most cost-efficient way to get some game time into players not selected for AFL games, according to Western Bulldogs coach Luke Beveridge.
With AFL-listed players not ab… [+2118 chars]
